articles.title: Stock Radar: Down 30% from highs! This restaurant stock looks attractive after 6-month consolidation - Economic Times
articles.description: Jubilant FoodWorks, with a market capitalization of nearly Rs 38000 crore, was consolidating in a range of Rs 575-450 on the weekly charts. ​Recently, the stock on the weekly charts recorded a breakout from the said range and inched closer to Rs 600 levels.
